interview_questions_sample_data.question: What is the main purpose of your application? (e.g., work permit as principal applicant, spouse/partner, or dependent child)
What is your full legal name as shown on your passport?
What is your date of birth?
What is your country of birth?
What is your current nationality?
What is your current address?
What is your email address?
What is your telephone number?
What is your passport number and its expiry date?
What is your passports expiry date?
Have you ever been issued a Canadian Unique Client Identifier (UCI) number?
If yes, please provide your UCI number.
What type of work permit are you applying for? (e.g., employer-specific, open work permit, post-graduation, etc.)
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Employer-specific work permit under the Temporary Foreign Worker Program

interview_questions_sample_data.question: What is the name of your Canadian employer (if applicable)?
What is the address of your Canadian employer (if applicable)?
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: 456 Innovation Drive, Suite 300, Toronto, Ontario, M5V 2H1, Canada

interview_questions_sample_data.question: What is your job title (if known)?
What is your jobs National Occupational Classification (NOC) code (if known)?
What is the expected start date of your employment in Canada?
What is the expected end date of your employment in Canada?
What is your annual salary (if applicable)?
What is your list of benefits (if applicable)?
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Health insurance, dental plan, and 3 weeks paid vacation

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Do you have a Labour Market Impact Assessment (LMIA) number for your job offer?
If yes, please provide the LMIA number.
Have you worked in Canada within the last 12 months?
If yes, please provide your previous Canadian employer's details.
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Cantech Systems, 789 Technology Boulevard, Vancouver, BC, V6B 4Y8, Canada. I worked there as a Software Developer from March 2024 to December 2024.

interview_questions_sample_data.question: What is your current occupation and employer (if different from your Canadian job offer)?
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: I am currently working as a Software Developer at Digital Innovations Nigeria Ltd in Lagos, Nigeria

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Have you ever been refused a visa or permit to Canada or any other country?
If yes, please explain.
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: I was refused a tourist visa to the United States in 2022 due to insufficient proof of ties to my home country.

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Have you ever been convicted of a crime or offense in any country?
If yes, please explain.
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: I received a misdemeanor conviction for a traffic violation in 2020, which resulted in a fine of $200 and no jail time.

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Do you have any serious medical conditions?
If yes, please specify.
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: I have Type 1 diabetes which is well-managed with medication.

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Will any family members accompany you to Canada?

If yes, please answer the following for each accompanying family member: Full name, Relationship to you, Date of birth, Passport number, Country of birth, Current occupation, Will they accompany you to Canada?
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Full name: Oluwaseun Oduntan, Relationship: Spouse, Date of birth: 15/05/1996, Passport number: B98765432, Country of birth: Nigeria, Current occupation: Pharmacist, Will accompany to Canada: Yes

interview_questions_sample_data.question: What is your marital status? (Single, Married, Common-law, Widowed, Divorced, Separated)
Do you have a spouse or common-law partner?
If yes, please provide: Full name, Date of birth, Country of birth, Current occupation
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Full name: Oluwaseun Oduntan, Date of birth: 15/05/1996, Country of birth: Nigeria, Current occupation: Pharmacist

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Do you have any children (natural, adopted, or step-children)?
If yes, please provide for each child: Full name, Date of birth, Country of birth, Current occupation, Will they accompany you to Canada?
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Full name: Adebayo Oduntan, Date of birth: 10/08/2020, Country of birth: Nigeria, Current occupation: Student, Will accompany to Canada: Yes

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Do you have any brothers or sisters (including half/step siblings)?
If yes, please provide for each sibling: Full name, Date of birth, Country of birth, Current occupation
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Full name: Tunde Oduntan, Date of birth: 23/11/1990, Country of birth: Nigeria, Current occupation: Civil Engineer

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Are you appointing an immigration representative to act on your behalf?
If yes, please provide: Representative's full name, Membership ID, Type of representative, Name of firm or organization, Representative's contact information
interview_questions_sample_data.sample_answer: Representative's full name: Sarah Johnson, Membership ID: R123456, Type of representative: Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant (RCIC), Name of firm: Canadian Immigration Solutions Ltd., Contact information: 123 Immigration Street, Toronto, Ontario, M5H 2N2, Canada, 416-555-7890, sarah.johnson@cis.com

interview_questions_sample_data.question: Do you authorize your representative to receive information about your application and your dependent children under 18 years of age?
Have you read and understood all the questions and information provided in this application?
Do you certify that all the information you have provided is complete, accurate, and truthful?

correction_examples.user_input: Sorry, my date of birth is actually 01/01/1995
correction_examples.correct_response: I've updated your date of birth to '01/01/1995'. What is your country of birth and your current nationality?

correction_examples.user_input: Actually, my name is Ayomipo Jesse Oduntan
correction_examples.correct_response: I've updated your full legal name to 'Ayomipo Jesse Oduntan'. Let's continue with the current question.

correction_examples.user_input: I need to change my email address to ayomipo.jesse@gmail.com
correction_examples.correct_response: I've updated your email address to 'ayomipo.jesse@gmail.com'. Let's continue with the current question.

correction_examples.user_input: I made a mistake. My passport expires on 20/05/2028
correction_examples.correct_response: I've updated your passport expiry date to '20/05/2028'. Let's continue with the current question.
Here's what you've provided so far: [displays all answers]

conditional_questions.child_question: If yes, please provide your UCI number.
